posting_body: Pre-Leasing 1 Bedroom 1.5 Bathroom...$1225 includes water...800 sq ft - Available August 2022
$1385/$1435 includes water...1000 sq ft - Available August 2022
Sterling Villas offers residents an apartment community in Lithonia, GA, with a truly unique atmosphere and a close proximity to I-20 for easy access to downtown Atlanta.
Retreat at Stonecrest provides residents with the choice of one, two, and three bedroom apartments.
***$65 Application Fee (Everyone Age 18+) Money Order Only.
***$400- A$600 Admin/Holding Fee (Goes Towards Your Approved Non-Refundable, Admin Fee) Money Order Only
ADMIN FEE & SECURITY DEPOSIT IS BASED ON YOUR CREDIT .
Credit score MUST BE 580 or above.
Income MUST BE three times rent
Sterling Villas also offers residents a relaxing swimming pool, laundry facility and ample parking.
We have a caring, professional management and maintenance staff.
We are located within minutes of I-20 downtown Atlanta, local schools, shopping, library, dining and entertainment.
